definition.name: Run GUT Tests
definition.description: Run GUT tests for a Godot project
definition.author: josephbmanley

inputs.name: containerImage
inputs.description: The container to run tests inside of.

inputs.name: useContainer
inputs.description: Boolean value of whether or not to run container.

inputs.name: godotExecutable
inputs.description: Path of Godot binary to call when running GUT tests.

inputs.name: directory
inputs.description: The name directory to run tests in.

evidence.reasoning: The action is specifically designed to run tests for a Godot project, which falls under the Testing category, and it involves building the project environment using a container, placing it also in the Build category.
